verbs.description: [ARGM-PRP: For her first state dinner] , [ARG1: First Lady Melania Trump] [V: was] [ARGM-NEG: not] [ARG2: to be missed] , [ARGM-PRD: choosing to wear a sleeveless silver Chanel gown] .
